ygData.subject: Lag
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, last night I got on as Cronik, finally.  The guild was very happy to see me. Made me feel better. The rest of the night totally bombed! I lagged horrible
ygData.messageBody:
Well, last night I got on as Cronik, finally. The guild
was very happy to see me. Made me feel better.
The rest of the night totally bombed! I lagged horrible
75% of the time I was on, was booted from my ISP 3
times, and played "Dodge the Cyclops and Aviak Evocate"
while my screen froze up on me.
The trip to Splitpaw was actually uneventful thank Thule!
I had screen freeze most of the way and it took me 10
minutes to get there from the Lake Rathe side.
After guild stuff and all the frustration of just trying
to cross zones I logged off as soon as I made it into
Splitpaw. I was not lagged at all the moment I got there
which made me feel better, but the way the night had
already gone, I logged off. Fate had been warning me all
night.
Hopefully I can get the Snakeskin Jerkin/Gloves/Mask(?)
and a RTS for my Druid. I will be solo so it will be
rough. Hopefully I can get a group started to help me.
Loot is good there anyway, so I will be dropping
anything but armor (cloth or snakeskin) and FS/Bronze
weapons if I can get any that is. :)

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous
